Package com.bitsavior.game

Class BackgroundMusic

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.game.BackgroundMusic
public class BackgroundMusic
extends java.lang.Object
represents the backgroundmusic of the actual game session including the ability to play, loop, pause and stop the musicstream It is also possible to adjust the volume and use a stuttering effect

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private float currentPosition
    current position inside the stream
    private long effectInterval
    the desired length of the interval that the music should run before there is a stutter in seconds
    private com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music music
    the actual music file
    private boolean stuttering
    enable and disable the stuttering effect
    private long timeSinceLastEffect
    the time since the last effect has taken place in milliseconds

    void disableStuttering()
    deactivates the stuttering effect
    void dispose()
    dispose the music

    gets the current position of the music stream

    sets the volume of the music

    stops the playing of the music

    updates the logic for the music including effects layed over the music

    • play

      public void play​(float volume)
      plays the music with a certain volume
      Parameters:
      volume - : the volume of the music that should be played must between 0.f - 100.f

    • setloop

      public void setloop​(boolean loop)
      activate or deactivate looping for the music
      Parameters:
      loop - : true if looping is desired, false if not

    • stop

      public void stop()
      stops the playing of the music

      : the current position of the music stream in seconds

    • setVolume

      public void setVolume​(float volume)
      sets the volume of the music
      Parameters:
      volume - : volume of the music must be between 0.f and 100.f

    • getVolume

      public float getVolume()
      gets the current music volume
      Returns:
      the volume of the music from (0,1) 0 = silent, 1= loud

    • setStuttering

      public void setStuttering​(float interval)
      activates the stuttering effect with a given interval
      Parameters:
      interval - : the desired length of the interval that the music should run before there is a stutter in seconds
